attributes.review: I downloaded this app to stay apprised of “good” ole Donny and now I keep getting ads for all things MAGA and White Lives Matter support groups. Really disturbing bc I didn’t even open the app yet 😱 If I could give less then a 1 star I would. Dangerous app with dangerous information.
attributes.title: Suggestions

attributes.review: when i opened this app i saw an annoying orange cheetos puff lookin man? i immediately started bursting into tears, the vibrant orange shade of his skin blinded my eyes for a spilt second. i was terrified, i was then put into shock causing me to have a heart attack. i do not recommend this app, i still have trauma from this experience. 🤬😭😔😝 👁👄👁 😾😾😾
attributes.title: THIS APP GAVE ME A HEART ATTACK

attributes.review: This app was disgusting, I had to ACTUALLY LOOK at the cheeto puff. I would not even wish that on my WORST enemies. It was such a horrible app that i didn’t even open it. I could not even stand the sight of the app alone. Worst app on here, if I could, I would leave a 0 star rating.
attributes.title: fans

attributes.review: This app should be banned! It is not useful! He will not be our president! And if he takes away social media gen z will be after him! So stop with your big ego and leave us in peace! You are America’s worst president! Have a horrible day and do not use this app people! Biden for president 2020!
attributes.title: Horrible!!!!

attributes.review: This app made my brain cells leave my body as if they were meant for to fly like the wind upon opening the app. The amount of disrespect this man has shown makes me believe his app will give me some sort of racial disease I don’t intend to attract. Please erase this app as to help other avoid such a horrible mistake
attributes.title: BAD BAD BAD

attributes.review: I don’t know what this gen z trend is, but I used this app and it was horrible. the alerts never came in, i saw trumps face way too much, it kept bugging and lagging, worst app on the WHOLE STORE!!! Do not recommend, Apple should remove this from the app store from the embarrassment it brings to the apple community.
attributes.title: GAVE ME DEPRESSION 1 STAR

attributes.review: It says #1 on the news app, even though the app rating is low. This is nothing more than government control to support him. I downloaded it to see what kinds of plans they had for him to run, but got nothing. I deleted the app after. Anyways, bernie 2020
attributes.title: Bad.

attributes.review: i came here to see what this GREAT COUNTRY is up to 😤😤😤 every time i open it my entire PHONE crashes. my innocent seven year old wanted to see the news “as any logical child” 😸 (were so proud) and when the app crashed he grabbed a kitchen knife and stabbed my husband 😡😤🤬. needless to say his fortnite privileges have been revoked😇
attributes.title: THIS IS THE WORST APP IVE EVER USED

attributes.review: this app took weeks to actually download and once it finally did it asked for credit card info, my social, etc. it was running very very slow and then it started playing inappropriate videos and audio and was glitching like crazy. then it started hacking into all my accounts on my phone and gave my phone a virus. i had to get an entirely new phone and i lost all of my contacts, messages, emails, etc. please get this app deleted before it does more harm.
attributes.title: tiktok

attributes.review: As soon as I opened this app it crashed. Everytime I tried to open the app it would just crash. And, when I would get in the screen would constantly freeze. This app is COMPLETELY un-usable. 0/5 would not recommend!!!!!!
attributes.title: Awful
